results.name: Expansion of (1-x)^(-1)/(1+2*x+x^2+x^3).
comment: Signed version of A060945: a(n) = (-1)^n * A060945(n).
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-1,1,0,1).
xref: All of A060945, A077930, A181532 are variations of the same sequence. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 04 2012
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 17 2002
